mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay_payments (member_no, pay_method, ord_code, amount, discount, total_price) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{payMethod}, #{ordCode}, #{amount}, #{discount}, #{totalPrice})
INSERT INTO pay_movie_and_payments (payments_no, rsv_no, ticket_quantity, movie_title) VALUES (#{payNo}, #{rsvNo}, #{ticketQuantity}, #{movieTitle})
